case_address_found_1: Savannah River outside the Marriott Hotel
case_circumstances: The unidentifed white male was witnessed by several individuals to walk up to the edge of the Savannah River near the Marriott Hotel in Savannah, GA on 10/25/10 at approximatel 1515 hours.  Once he reached the edge of the river he jumped in.  Emergency personnel were immediately notified by the witnesses.  Searches were conducted andon the third day the male's body was recovered in the river a short distance from where he was seen to have gone in.
case_head_hair: Thick, full head of gray hair
case_clothing_on_body: Blue button-up long-sleeve shirt, blue long-sleeve t-shirt, tan pants with a brown woven leather belt, white briefs, and a pair of white socks
case_footwear: A pair of white athletic shoes with velcro straps.  On the inner edge of each shoe "H. Wright" had been written in permanent marker
case_other_items_with_body: white handkerchief in a pocket of his pants
dental: Dental information / charting is available and will be entered later
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
